name: BulletBeat
description:
BulletBeat is a shoot'em up inspired by J-Pop princess Kyary Pamyu Pamyu. Inspired, I say? It's more like a tribute. And she's the Goddess. This is like a ritual sacrifice to summon her. And we dance like there's no tomorrow.

Kyary is the thread that ties everything together. And yeah, in our wildest dreams we can get her to play this.

It's still in early development, so there could be some (or a ton of) bugs and glitches.

Arrow Keys - move the character around

Z (hold) - shoot

Left Shift (hold) - focus / slow down

Game & level design / code / sfx by Ariel Cid

Visual art by Mosho

Music by KUNIO (MASUO YAMAMOTO)

Original song by Kyary Pamyu Pamyu


We don't own anything to Kyary Pamyu Pamyu's image, art nor music. This is a non-profit tribute game and will always remain free. Please don't sue. Please don't take it down. Pretty please, with sugar on top.
